WorkPlace.Name: PETER SKOV JOHANSEN
WorkPlace.Description: GreenPeas is the main producer of fresh hand-picked peas sold as snack on the European market. GreenPeas is a Danish company operating in different European countries, mainly in Denmark, Portugal, Italy and Germany. The peas are picked by hand by 300 - 400 persons in the period March-September.

The peas are picked by hand by 300 - 400 persons in the period March-September.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Greenpeas A/S is looking for an independent, fresh, and reflective colleague to participate in the production of, among other things, fresh green peas, strawberries, and Christmas trees.

GreenPeas A/S is Europe's largest producer of fresh green peas used for snacks, salads, and cooking. Sales take place in the Danish and European wholesale and retail markets.

About the position

Do you dream of a workplace where you have freedom under responsibility?

As an employee, you get a varied working day and will be part of a team of Danish and foreign employees.

The tasks will mainly be sowing, planting, spraying, and other fieldwork.

In addition, you will participate in the harvest work and other tasks in connection with the company's production.

The main activities will take place in Denmark - but if you are the right one, travel and work exchange between Portugal and Denmark will be an option for shorter or longer periods, partly to exchange knowledge and experience and partly to contribute to the different production seasons.

Your tasks will be among others:

- Execution of practical fieldwork in collaboration with the manager.

- Maintenance and repair of machines so that they function optimally in a busy everyday life.

- Participation in the harvest season with for example transport, technical support, etc.

- Participation in other ad-hoc tasks in connection with the production.

About you:

- You have professional or extensive experience with driving and using agricultural machinery

- You have Spraying Certificate

- You have a sense of order

- You are collaborative

- You are flexible in relation to working hours

- You have the desire and willingness to perform ad-hoc work.

- You have knowledge of the production of Christmas trees, strawberries, or other vegetables or the willingness to learn.

- Represents an advantage if you have knowledge of MarkOnline

- You have a driving license for a car and preferably for a truck too

- You have English language skills

We expect:

- You can work independently, take responsibility, and make your own decision.

- You have the will to prioritize and achieve the goals you have set

- You have a positive life view and a positive and acceptable view of other people

- You are flexible and able to plan your own work

As an applicant for this job, it is not expected to have experience in growing peas, strawberries, or Christmas trees. It will be an advantage to have practical experience in general fieldwork.

We offer:

-An international team of young ambitious people, all working with a visionary perspective

- Opportunities to develop personal and professional skills

- Remuneration according to qualifications and by further agreement.

Job starts as soon as possible.

Any questions about the position can be directed to Annelise Nielsen on tel. 0045 20721290 and by email at ani@greenpeas.dk
